title: Orient
synopsis: Five years ago, Musashi made a promise with his friend Kojirou Kanemaki that once they grew up, they would become samurai, form a league, and go on demon-slaying quests. But since then, things have changed. With demons now being praised and worshipped by society, the samurai are shunned and disgraced.
characters: ['Musashi', 'Kanemaki, Kojirou', 'Hattori, Tsugumi', 'Takeda, Naotora', 'Inukai, Shirou', 'Inusaka, Nanao', 'Kosameda, Hideo']
voices: ['Uchida, Yuuma', 'Saitou, Souma', 'Takahashi, Rie', 'Hino, Satoshi', 'Shimono, Hiro', 'Waki, Azumi', 'Hatano, Wataru']
